head.title: Metro Briefing | New Jersey: Newark: Missing Woman's Body Found

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New Jersey: Newark: Missing Woman's Body Found

body.head.byline: By JOHN HOLL; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Body of Kasie DeJarnette is found inside metal garbage can in vacant lot near construction site in Newark, and she appears to have died from asphyxiation (S)

block.p: The body of a missing Newark woman was found inside a metal garbage can in a vacant lot near a construction site on Brookdale Avenue on Monday night, the Essex County prosecutor's office said yesterday. Relatives reported the woman, Kasie DeJarnette, 38, missing last month, said Paul M. Loriquet, a spokesman for the prosecutor. She appeared to have died from asphyxiation, he said, but the case would not be ruled a homicide until after a medical examiner's evaluation.

Relatives reported the woman, Kasie DeJarnette, 38, missing last month, said Paul M. Loriquet, a spokesman for the prosecutor. She appeared to have died from asphyxiation, he said, but the case would not be ruled a homicide until after a medical examiner's evaluation.
